item.title: Listening effort and multilingual speech communication: Neural measures of auditory and lexical processing by adults and older children
item.description: I am a postdoctoral reseacher on this ESRC grant (October 2017 - September 2020, PI: Prof. Paul Iverson). You can see the summary of this project here, and please see publications and presentations related to this project. People feel like they need to “listen harder” when communicating in a second language, but it isn’t clear how this effort changes the brain processes involved in recognising speech.
